title: The Loading screen never comes
body:
Hi - My issue is that the loading screen never shows up for me.  I go through the champ select fine, but when it comes time for the loading screen to come it never does.  my profile is marked as 'in game', and I have the 'reconnect' button, but the reconnect button doesn't do anything, and i cannot reach the loading screen.  Is there a driver associated with LOL? I've had a lot of issues recently that were resolved by updating the driver.  If not, I got nuthin, and would appreciate some assistance.

Thanks

replies.body: Probably not a driver issue, but I'm confident there's some unstable connection blocking you from the game server.  Try out the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide in a custom game to help rule out some possibilities and strengthen your network.
